presentationColumns.name: Ordered Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of ordered amount at distribution level inclusive of inclusive taxes.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Ordered Amount

presentationColumns.name: Total Exclusive Tax Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of total exclusive tax amount at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Total Exclusive Tax Amount

presentationColumns.name: Total Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of total amount at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Total Amount

presentationColumns.name: Non Recoverable Tax Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of non recoverable tax amount at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Non Recoverable Tax Amount

presentationColumns.name: Recoverable Tax Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of recoverable tax amount at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Recoverable Tax Amount

presentationColumns.name: Non Recoverable Inclusive Tax Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of non recoverable inclusive tax amount at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Non Recoverable Inclusive Tax Amount

presentationColumns.name: Recoverable Inclusive Tax Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of recoverable inclusive tax amount at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Recoverable Inclusive Tax Amount

presentationColumns.name: Delivered Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of delivered amount at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Delivered Amount

presentationColumns.name: Billed Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of billed amount at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Billed Amount

presentationColumns.name: Cancelled Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of cancelled amount at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Cancelled Amount

presentationColumns.name: Accepted Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of accepted amount at schedule level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Accepted Amount

presentationColumns.name: Accepted Rate
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of accepted amount divided by sum of received amount at schedule level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Accepted Rate

presentationColumns.name: Received Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of received amount at schedule level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Received Amount

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of shipped amount at schedule level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Shipped Amount

presentationColumns.name: Avg Unit Price
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of ordered amount excluding inclusive taxes divided by sum of ordered quantity.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Avg Unit Price

presentationColumns.name: Max Unit Price
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as maximum of ordered amount excluding inclusive taxes divided by sum of ordered quantity at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Max Unit Price

presentationColumns.name: Min Unit Price
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as minimum of ordered amount excluding inclusive taxes divided by sum of ordered quantity at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Min Unit Price

presentationColumns.name: Avg Unit Price (Primary UOM)
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of ordered amount excluding inclusive taxes divided by sum of ordered quantity in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Avg Unit Price (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Max Unit Price (Primary UOM)
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as maximum of ordered amount excluding inclusive taxes divided by sum of ordered quantity at distribution level in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Max Unit Price (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Min Unit Price (Primary UOM)
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as maximum of ordered amount excluding inclusive taxes divided by sum of ordered quantity at distribution level in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Min Unit Price (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Average Amount Per PO
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of ordered amount divided by count of distinct purchase orders.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Average Amount Per PO

presentationColumns.name: Negotiated Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows amount of the purchase order lines which has negotiated indicator as Y.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Negotiated Amount

presentationColumns.name: Open PO Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows the sum of ordered amount at distribution level inclusive of inclusive taxes with status equal to Open and Closed for Receiving.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Open PO Amount

presentationColumns.name: Closed PO Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows the sum of ordered amount at distribution level inclusive of inclusive taxes with status equal to Closed for Invoicing, Closed and Finally Closed.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Closed PO Amount

presentationColumns.name: Over Receipt Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows amount that is received more than purchase order quantity at schedule level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Over Receipt Amount
